ValidationRule.description: Suggested Liquidation Date is required before Transfer Letter is sent to the client
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ((ISNULL(Suggested_Liquidation_Date__c) && NOT(ISNULL(Transfer_Letter_sent_to_client__c)) && Transfer_Letter_sent_to_client__c > DATE(2021,06,27)) || (ISNULL(Suggested_Blackout_Date__c) && NOT(ISNULL(Transfer_Letter_sent_to_client__c)) && Transfer_Letter_sent_to_client__c > DATE(2021,06,27))) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Conversion_Type__c, "Solo 401(k) Plan"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter both a Suggested Liquidation Date and Suggested Blackout Date to continue.
